item.title: THINKWORK Bolt Extractor Set, 18 Pieces Impact Bolt & Nut Remover Set, Stripped Lug Nut Remover, Extraction Socket Set for Removing Damaged, Frozen, Rusted, Rounded-Off Bolts, Nuts & Screws

item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Manufacturer ‎THINKWORK
Part Number ‎W6030
Item Weight ‎2.44 pounds
Product Dimensions ‎8.86 x 5.98 x 1.97 inches
Color ‎18-Piece
Style ‎18 pieces traditional bolt extractor set
Material ‎Chrome molybdenum steel
Number Of Pieces ‎18
Compatible Fastener Range ‎0.25 inches
Batteries Included? ‎No
Batteries Required? ‎No

Additional Information

ASIN B08KZMBKZP
Customer Reviews

4.6 out of 5 stars

1,033 ratings

4.6 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #15,071 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)
#14 in Tap Extractors
Date First Available October 10, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $32.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:06 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Material
Cr-V Cr-M Cr-M Cr-M Cr-V Cr-V

Drive Size
1/2″ , 1/4″, 3/8″ 1/2″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 1/2″

Style
/ 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 & 12 Point Shallow

Are you tired of the bolts, nuts, and screws are damaged even if stripped, rusted, or frozen? What will you do? Break it loose with a breaker bar and then fitting the new socket by a hammer or a mallet? But this will damage your socket. Thankfully, THINKWORK impact bolt extractor set is around you to help you to continue to work on your project with ease.

Includes 16 pieces of the most used SAE and metric sizes impact bolt extractors.

3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″.

Superior Gripping Power

The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes is designed to bite down to provide maximum gripping power. The more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.

Hex Adapter & Knockout Pin

1/4″ drive hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.

Standard 3/8 Inch Square Drive

All the extractors can be used by hand tools or any 3/8-inch air and power tools.

Organized Storage

All the extractors are well packed in a heavy-duty blow-molded case for secure storage and easy carry.

Each bolt extractor is made of high hardness chrome-molybdenum steel for superior durability and longer life. It will easily extract damaged bolts, nuts, and screws even if they are stripped, rusted, or frozen.
The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes design to bite down to provide maximum gripping power, the more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.
Standard 3/8-inch drive and hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.
18 pieces 3/8 inch drive bolt & nut remover comes with 3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″, hex adapter and knockout pin.
Heavy-duty blow-molded case lets all the extraction sockets stay organized and take your set on the go.








W6028
W6009
W6008
W6030
W6050
USS19F
Material Cr-V Cr-M Cr-M Cr-M Cr-V Cr-V
Drive Size 1/2″ , 1/4″, 3/8″ 1/2″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 1/2″
Style / 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 & 12 Point Shallow

Hex Adapter & Knockout Pin

1/4″ drive hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.

Standard 3/8 Inch Square Drive

All the extractors can be used by hand tools or any 3/8-inch air and power tools.

All the extractors are well packed in a heavy-duty blow-molded case for secure storage and easy carry.

#1 in Tool Trays
Date First Available March 31, 2021

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.95 - $25.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:08:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Take Control of Your Workspace and Always Find What You Need with these collapsible parts trays!

Perfect for most any use the Sandor Magnetic Parts Trays each measure 4″ x 4″ with a strong rubber-covered non-marring magnet to protect surfaces from scratches. Perfect for holding screws, bolts, nuts, washers, small metal tools and parts to help keep you work area neat, clean, and organized.

This 3-Piece Parts Tray Set delivers both quality plus savings that you wouldn’t get from other Tool Organizers and Magnetic Screw Trays.

WHY YOU NEED THIS TOOL:

3 Piece Collapsible Parts Trays – Blue, Red & GreenEasy to Expand and CollapseStrong Non-Marring Magnet that Holds to Almost Any Metal SurfaceEasy to Clean High-Grade Silicone ConstructionTray Dimensions Measure 4.25″ x 4.25″Expands to 2″ Tall. ¾” When CollapsedStores Your Small Tools and Items with Ease

A Versatile & Useful Tool for Any Professional or Hobbyist!

COLLAPSIBLE MAGNETIC PARTS TRAYS: The Sandor Magnetic Parts Trays each measure 4.25″ x 4.25″ with a strong rubber-covered non-marring magnet to protect surfaces from scratches. Perfect for holding screws, bolts, nuts, washers, small metal tools and parts to help keep you work area neat, clean, and organized
3 COLORS – SAE | METRIC | TORX: Save space and neatly organize your workspace. Every order of Sandor Collapsible Parts Trays includes 1 blue, 1 red, and 1 green parts tray so that you can easily color code nuts, bolts, tools, sockets, wrenches and more. Now you will always be able to find what you need just when you need it!
EASY TO USE. EASY TO CLEAN: Easily expands to 2” and collapses down to only ¾”. The silicone design can be easily cleaned with soap and water. Strong magnetic base holds to most metal surfaces. Perfect for hobbyists, automotive, mechanics, engineers, plumbers, carpenters, machinists, HVAC & more
REAL TOOLS. REAL QUALITY: Our automotive and machinist hand tools are tough-as-nails. Made of high-grade silicone to ensure high strength, hardness, wear, and resistance for durability. The low-profile design allows for compact and easy storage
TRUSTED BRAND! WE STAND BY OUR PRODUCTS: When others talk quality, we deliver it. That’s why we always offer a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. At SANDOR Tool we only use the highest quality materials in our products, and we go the extra mile to stand by our tools. Your satisfaction is our priority. It’s that simple

This 3-Piece Parts Tray Set delivers both quality plus savings that you wouldn’t get from other Tool Organizers and Magnetic Screw Trays.
